import java.util.Scanner;


 class Rectangle_Area {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in);
		
		int test=s.nextInt();
        while(test>0)
        {
        	int ele=s.nextInt();
        	ele=ele/2;
        	int l=ele/2;
        	int b=ele-l;
        	
        
        	System.out.println(l*b);
        	test--;
        	
        }
	}

}
